name: Shark Swimulator
description:
Shark Swimulator is a game about a shark who needs to "rescue" a diver from his underwater prison. Are you a shark enough dude to save him?!

Shark Swimulator was created using the *awesome* LÖVE game framework. We used a preview build of LÖVE 0.10.0 and that is required to run the source. The Windows build is pre-built so it should run fine on any hardware that supports OpenGL 2.1.

Shark Swimulator is translated in English, French, German, Greek, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, and Russian and a bonus language. The game is also fully voiced in English, German, and the bonus language.

Hotkeys:
F9: Change the language
Pause: Mute audio
Alt+Enter: Full screen

Controls:
WS/ud: swim around
QE: Zoom camera
Mouse: Rotate camera

This game has gamepad support and should work with any Xbox 360 or compatible controller. If your controller doesn't work, try launching the game from Steam.

Basic Mechanics:
Slam your sexy shark face into the rope or cage to save the diver from his bonds.

Additional Information:
If you get a crash or the game won't run, you can grab a crash.log file from %APPDATA% (or your OS's equivalent). Please send us the crash log and your system specs in one of the methods listed at the top of the crash.log file.

Thank you for playing our game! <3
